Title: Kill Bill: The Whole Bloody Affair
Writer: Quentin Tarantino, Uma Thurman (character The Bride)
Actors: Michael Bowen, David Carradine, Shin'ichi Chiba, Julie Dreyfus
Plot: The Bride must kill her ex-boss and lover Bill who betrayed her at her wedding ceremony, shot her in the head and took away her unborn daughter. But first, she must make the other four members of the Deadly Viper Assassination Squad suffer.
